page.description: Converts SVG content into windows JPEG file content.
page.example:
dim svg as c = <<%str% <svg height="100" width="100"> <circle cx="50" cy="50" r="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="3" fill="red" /> </svg> %str% dim bl as b = charting::Chart::SvgToJpeg(svg) file.from_blob("c:\data\circle.jpeg",bl)
sys_open("c:\data\circle.jpeg")
